properties.name: movie.api-server
properties.description: Default to: https://imdb8.p.rapidapi.com/title/get-details?tconst=ID. The ID will be replaced, so it's necessary.

properties.name: movie.header-key
properties.description: This header-key can be obtain in your https://rapidapi.com/ profile.

properties.name: movie.task-name
properties.description: The name of the Task created in Data Flow.

properties.name: movie.dropbox.token
properties.description: This is the DropBox Token and MUST be set. You can get this token in the dropbox.com/developers.

properties.name: movie.dropbox.path
properties.description: The path wherwe the file will be upload.

properties.name: movie.dropbox.local-tmp-folder
properties.description: The local Temp file where the file will be pickup and uploaded.
